name: Valley of the Coins
description:
I started this piece by using this old piece of carpet, which I scanned in and used it to create the textured pattern to fill the wave style pattern. I then continued more with my experiments with the burn tool but also started to experiment with various maximize and minimize colour channel filters, and then applied various lighting and gradient effects to the piece.

As a last element, I tried a new technique: I applied a slight very subtle glitch to the piece - so technically it’s my first glitch piece!
